title: My mouse is perilously close to "Memes and Games" on an extremely frequent basis
body:
It makes me uncomfortable. I fear one day the anxiety of almost clicking on it on a daily basis will be too much, and I could suffer from a serious medical condition. For this reason, I would like to request that Riot please include at least a 1 to 25 inch space between Memes & Games and General Discussion. This will alleviate any anxiety I am currently having and will decrease the high risk that I (and others like myself) could have something terrible happen to them as a result of nearly clicking on Memes & Games on a daily basis. It is only a matter of time, Riot, I implore you.




I originally made this two years ago, it is still true to this day, but the link breaks because board censorship OP https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/BAd%%%TU-my-mouse-is-perilously-close-to-memes-games-on-an-extremely-frequent-basis?show=flat&page=2
